verbs.description: [ARG0: Chancellor Angela Merkel] [V: made] [ARG1: a forceful pitch for Europe to play a more assertive role in global affairs] [ARGM-TMP: as U.S. President Donald Trump] [ARG1: dismantles the post - World War II order , setting the stage for a potential tense standoff at the Group of Seven summit this week] .

Chancellor Angela Merkel made a forceful pitch for [ARG0: Europe] to [V: play] [ARG1: a more assertive role in global affairs] [ARGM-TMP: as U.S. President Donald Trump dismantles the post - World War II order , setting the stage for a potential tense standoff at the Group of Seven summit this] week .

Chancellor Angela Merkel made a forceful pitch for Europe to play a more assertive role in global affairs as [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: dismantles] [ARG1: the post - World War II order] , setting the stage for a potential tense standoff at the Group of Seven summit this week .

[ARG0: Chancellor Angela Merkel] made a forceful pitch for Europe to play a more assertive role in global affairs as U.S. President Donald Trump dismantles the post - World War II order , [V: setting] [ARG1: the stage] [ARGM-PRP: for a potential tense standoff at the Group of Seven summit this week] .
